| History                 = The Pazzo Family were led by [[Freddo Pazzo (Earth-616)|Freddo Pazzo]] a mob boss who was an inexperienced brash crimelord who modeled himself on gangster movies, and refused to listen to his advisors. [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] rescued a girl from the family, who had kidnapped her to force her indebted and broker father to pay, killing several soldiers. He later offered to help them deal with a rival mob led by Roman, in exchange for them forgiving the man's debt. 

He disrupted the rival mob's operations and killed their boss. Only to discover that Freddo broke the deal by kidnapping the daughter again along with her father, holding them hostage to force Wolverine to kill a protected witness for him. Wolverine didn't do as he asked and made a deal with the underboss, who was fed up with Freddo's shenanigans. The witness testified and an enraged Freddo got into his limousine, which was actually been driven by Wolverine who took him to an isolated spot. Where the underboss [[Johnny Delacavva (Earth-616)|Johnny Delacavva]] executed Freddo, having assumed leadership of the family and forgiven the man's debt.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 181|185}}
